title: Augusta County: Samuel Franklin Carson to Annie Harris, July 6, 1863
summary: Samuel Carson describes his inability to return to the army after his furlough because the Yankees are in his way. He then recounts what he has heard about the Battle of Gettysburg, which took place just a few days before.
keywords: Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Desertion/Leave, Military Authority, Prisons/Prisoners, American Civil War
